resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: id
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Used as an RDN when naming an instance of the object class.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: userLabel
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: A user-friendly (and user assignable) name of this object

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: vnfParametersList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Parameter set of the VNF instance(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: peeParametersList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Parameter list for the control and monitoring of power, energy and environment

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: intraANRSwitch
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Whether the intra E-UTRAN ANR function is activated or deactivated

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: iRATANRSwitch
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Whether the IRAT ANR function is activated or deactivated

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: eNBId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Unambiguously identifies an eNodeB within a PLMN

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: x2BlackList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: List of target nodes prohibited X2 connections

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: x2WhiteList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: List of target nodes allowed X2 connections

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: x2HOBlackList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: List of target nodes prohibited handover

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: x2IpAddressList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: IP addresses used for this ENBFunction's X2 Interface

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: tceIDMappingInfoList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: List of Trace Collection Entity (TCE) ID and IP Address (3GPP 32.422)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: sharNetTceMappingInfoList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: List of shared PLMN ID, Trace Collection Entity (TCE) ID and IP Address (3GPP 32.422)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: netListeningRSForRIBS
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: RS for RIBS ('Radio Interface based Synchronization' in 3GPP 36.300)
